mapper.select: select tc.*,ta.user_name,ta.create_time as belongTime,tc.create_by as allocator,c.channel_name,ac.name as activityName,ac.info as activityInfo from tienchin_clue tc left join tienchin_assignment ta on tc.`id`=ta.`assign_id` left join tienchin_channel c on c.channel_id=tc.channel left join tienchin_activity ac on ac.id=tc.activity_id where tc.id=#{id}
